name: Thunderbolt
description: Deadly at close range.

name: Sledgehammer
description: Powerful shotgun.

name: Hammerfall
description: Deadly at close range.

name: Spitfire
description: Deadly at close range. Limited firing angle.

name: Lupara
description: Deadly at close range.

name: Pyre
description: Powerful infrared-homing missile.

name: ZS-34 Fat Man
description: Turret cannon. Allows for precise shots at any range in any direction.

name: GL-55 Impulse
description: Automatic grenade launcher. Difficult to use, but has great destructive power.

name: MG13 Equalizer
description:
Maximum rate of fire and overheating threshold.
Needs time to spin up barrels.

name: AC72 Whirlwind
description: Great accuracy, but requires experience in aiming at long ranges.

name: Reaper
description: Cannon with the highest rate of fire and projectile velocity. Needs time to spin up barrels.

name: AC43 Rapier
description: Great accuracy, but requires experience in aiming at long ranges.

name: Spectre-2
description: Twin machine gun. Deals increased damage at the cost of higher energy drain.

name: Executioner 88mm
description: Ballistics, lead, huge damage. Has limited firing angle.

name: Harvester
description: Deals additional damage while in contact with the target.

name: Scorpion
description: Boasts great accuracy, ideal for any scope.

name: Borer
description: Deals additional damage while in contact with the target.

name: Hurricane
description: Volley of 4 infrared-homing missiles.

name: Retcher
description: Automatic grenade launcher. Launches a volley of 4 very slow projectiles with ballistics.

name: Porcupine
description: Lays burning barrels filled with explosive materials and metal chunks. The barrel explodes on contact with vehicles or when hit with any weapons. Self-destructs in 20 sec.

name: Little Boy 6LB
description: Turret cannon allows for precise shots at any range in any direction.

name: Judge 76mm
description: Ballistics, lead, huge damage. Has limited firing angle.

name: Buzzsaw
description: Deals additional damage while in contact with the target.

name: ST-M23 Defender
description: Great accuracy. Limited fire angle.

name: MD-3 Owl
description:
Launches a mobile combat drone attacking all targets in radius.
Equipped with a missile launcher.

name: Lancelot
description: An elegant weapon, for a more civilized age.

name: LM-54 Chord
description:
Great against weak points.
Allows to quickly dispatch enemies at medium range.

name: AD-12 Falcon
description:
Launches a mobile combat drone attacking all targets in radius.
Equipped with a basic machine gun.

name: Avenger 57mm
description: Ballistics, lead, huge damage. Has limited firing angle.

name: DT Cobra
description: Builds a combat turret defending the perimeter for a limited time.

name: RT Anaconda
description: Builds a combat turret defending the perimeter for a limited time.

name: Spike-1
description: When gunpowder and explosives are running dry, good old cables, springs and rebars come in handy. Works just as well.

name: Firebug
description: Only a madman could've dreamed up using fire in close combat. Apparently there's no shortage of madmen among the Engineers...

name: Sidekick
description: Launches a mobile wheeled combat drone attacking all targets in radius.

name: Clarinet TOW
description:
Guided missile. For a couple of seconds after launch the operator can guide the direction of the missile's detonation.

Only one weapon of this type can be installed on the car.

name: Caucasus
description:
An intelligent defence complex. Just point at the target and it does the rest.

To start your attack, hold the trigger for a second, while keeping an enemy in the weapon's range in your crosshairs.

name: Mandrake
description: Enormous firepower and ability to deal damage from a large distance while hidden in cover are offset by significant recoil, high spread in motion and utter helplessness in melee combat.

name: Fuze
description: Deploys mobile drones, exploding upon proximity to targets.

name: BC-17 Tsunami
description: Has tremendous recoil, high accuracy and high muzzle velocity.

name: Synthesis
description: Launches a dense batch of overheated plasma.

name: Quasar
description: Projects a ball lightning dealing significant damage to any matter it contacts with.

name: Aurora
description: Fusion of mechanics and electronics. Air cooling of barrels provides uninterrupted pulse laser rate of fire. Sadly, effective range in the atmosphere is very limited.

name: Barrier IX
description: Creates a large-radius static defence field in the activation spot, absorbing damage from fast projectiles and energy flows for a couple of seconds.

name: Spark III
description: Deals identical damage to all targets in the aiming cone. Effective against multiple enemies.

name: ST-M26 Tackler
description:
Great accuracy. Reduced energy requirements.
Limited fire angle.

name: Skinner
description:
Harpoon a metal fish! This cannon launches a spear with a sturdy rope attached to it. It latches onto the surface on hit.
Penetrates up to 1 m of armor.

name: Junkbow
description: Mass production of ammunition fell into oblivion together with the old world. Don't worry, you can charge the “Junkbow” with all sorts of literal junk right from the Wasteland!

name: Phoenix
description:
A simple crossbow wasn't enough for Firestarter engineers, so they added a bit of explosives.
The projectile sticks to the enemy hull and after a few seconds deals significant damage during the explosion. But if the victim or its allies have time to destroy the projectile while the wick is burning, then detonation will not happen.

name: Draco
description: This used to be an agricultural flamethrower for destruction of weeds and pests. A rare case, when the essence has not changed over time.

name: Fortune
description:
Launches three wheels, which roll happily and explode when they collide with an enemy or receive damage.
They are stuffed with unstable explosives, so they detonate after 8 sec.

name: Incinerator
description: Launches an incendiary projectile, that leaves a burning area at the place of explosion. When you hit someone with this weapon, Firestarters scream, it seems, something about a fiery hyena. Apparently, they do not know that they are not found in Wasteland.

name: Cyclone
description: An arms race often becomes the engine of progress. Who would have thought that you could squeeze out additional firepower from a twin auto-cannon. But it happened. Moreover, Cyclone's rate of fire rises while shooting!

name: M-37 Piercer
description: Machine gun with extreme rate of fire and a burst fire mode. Don't expect pinpoint accuracy and huge damage, but it can provide surprising density of fire.

name: Prometheus V
description: It's amazing how ideas of inventions come almost simultaneously to different people. The creators of Prometheus V, although they had worked independently, assembled a weapon very reminiscent of Synthesis. Each shot boosts the next one.

name: Fafnir
description:
The engineer in charge of this metal monster's design was clearly inspired by legends of dragons.
A volley from a couple of these shotguns can literally vaporise anyone who's foolish enough to stand too close.

name: Aspect
description: This machine gun requires nerves of steel to deal maximum damage. But with sufficient gunner skill it's unparalleled at medium distances.

name: Kapkan
description:
A curious weapon with mines that won't let a single victim elude you.
Does not affect trucks and leviathans.

name: Corvo
description:
Looks very much like a gun from the very old world, when the knechte were far from roaming the Wasteland's highways. It very well may be that there were no highways at all (such savagery!).
Ammunition reserves and reloading speed can't be changed. The clip is reloaded automatically.

name: Nidhogg
description:
Deliberate, yet lethal force that's fit to sing songs about.
The shotgun reaches its peak efficiency at close range and high speed.

name: Helios
description: Allegedly, the early prototypes of this emitter were very unstable and took the lives of at least as many allies as they did enemies. But does all this really matter if it launches a volley of 5 plasma pellets, deals high damage and has incredible accuracy?

name: M-38 Fidget
description: Twin-barrel rapid-fire machine gun. Commonly used by Steppenwolfs in quick Wasteland skirmishes, where you always need to be quick on your wheels.

name: M-39 Imp
description: This innovative Steppenwolf weapon boasts very high rate of fire and deadly damage. Used for setting up mobile ambushes to destroy parts of hostile armored vehicles at short range extremely quickly.

name: Leech
description: With a bit of dexterity, capable of both close and long range battles. Excels in its structural balance, which is very out of type for the followers of Psycho Pete.
